pages.title: Summoning
pages.text: Beware that when you summon a pixie, you are bound to their Court! This means other courts might not be willing to interact with you afterwards.

pages.title: Summoning
pages.text: Also note that not all pixies are willing familiars, and they might trick you! Try interacting with your pixie after you summoned one, if possible try to gain their trust.

pages.title: Summoning Spring Pixie
pages.text: With this scroll you can summon a Spring Pixie. The presence of a Spring Pixie will cause life stock to more fertile.

pages.title: Summoning Summer Pixie
pages.text: With this scroll you can summon a Summer Pixie. As a proud member of the Summer Court the Summer Pixie will smite down her foes.

pages.title: Summoning Autumn Pixie
pages.text: With this scroll you can summon a Autumn Pixie. Autumn Pixies will try to ward off any evil spirits by turning Pumpkins into Carved Pumpkins and Jack o Lanterns

pages.title: Summoning Winter Pixie
pages.text: With this scroll you can summon a Winter Pixie. The Winter Pixie will occasionally summon back a soul into a snowman's body.
